content.query:
drop table dw.descontos
go
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE NAME = 'descontos' AND TYPE = 'U')
CREATE TABLE dw.descontos
	(
	 [pk_documento_condicao] bigint,
	 [Tipo] nvarchar(30),
	 [Valor] nvarchar(30),
	 [Percentual] nvarchar(30)
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	 -- HEAP
	)
GO

--Uncomment the 4 lines below to create a stored procedure for data pipeline orchestrationâ€‹                 
--CREATE PROC bulk_load_descontos
--AS
--BEGIN
COPY INTO dw.descontos
(pk_documento_condicao 1, Tipo 2, Valor 3, Percentual 4)
FROM 'https://sadevbrdatalakemalwee.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/brazil/demo/descontos/2021/02/08/descontos__202102081030.csv'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'CSV'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
	,FIRSTROW = 2
	,ERRORFILE = 'https://sadevbrdatalakemalwee.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/'
	,IDENTITY_INSERT = 'OFF'
)
--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dw.descontos
GO
